detail_desc: Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in lace with a skirt in a pleated weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with an overlocked hem. Partly lined.

Concentrated, scented machine and hand wash laundry liquid that is impressive even at low temperatures. Bonus: helps colours to stay vibrant. For all types of laundry (30-90°C). Select 30°C to save energy (your laundry will be just as clean). Free from phosphates, zeolites and bleach. Made in a climate-neutral factory in Vadstena, Sweden. 9 washes (medium water). 500 ml. For contents and further information see www.hm.com/takecare.
Soft, organic cotton jersey shorts in various designs.
Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and long sleeves with a decorative pattern made from bugle beads at the cuffs. Lined.
Short dress in airy, patterned viscose crêpe with a V-neck with decorative buttoning at the front. Short sleeves finished with a knot detail, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Vest top in printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the armholes and slits in the sides.
Gloves in soft leather with a soft, fine-knit lining.

Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a lyocell blend containing some linen with an opening and ties at the top and short puff sleeves. Narrow elastication and a small frill trim around the top, sleeves and hem.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a drawstring at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit with a fluffy finish. Motif on the front, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
40 denier tights with reinforcement at the top for a light shaping effect on the tummy.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a real suede decorative tassel. Narrow, adjustable shoulder strap, zip at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 7x16x22 cm.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Elastic-trimmed hood with ears at the top, two concealed zips down the front for easy changing, and long sleeves with foldover mitts to keep the hands warm. Soft fleece lining made from recycled polyester.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Dress in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and short sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in a patterned, viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck.

Lightly padded bomber jacket with a lined, detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Gathered seams down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
All-in-one pyjamas in organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar, chest pocket and press-studs down the front, at the crotch and down the insides of the legs.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide, tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Bouclé coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, a diagonal zip at the front, diagonal chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck, long sleeves and a slit at one side of the hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in jacquard-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose blend.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in imitation leather with a collar and covered buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Trainers with a padded edge and lacing at the front. imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Trenchcoat in airy twill made from a viscose blend with a decorative double-breasted fastening at the front. Notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and side pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, a loose yoke at the back and a single back vent. Unlined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in satin with sequins and beaded embroidery at the front and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft modal jersey.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. V-neck with a wrapover front and an opening with ties at the back.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Fully lined bikini with a lace pattern. Top with narrow shoulder straps and three layers of frills. Bottoms with a frill trim at the waist.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft pointelle knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Round shoulder bag in paper straw with a shoulder strap and zip at the top. Size 5x18.5 cm.
Bracelets in metal curb chain with a trigger clasp. One bracelet is decorated with rhinestones.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Short metal necklace with sparkly stones. Adjustable length approx. 28-35 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and tie detail at the hem.
Shorts in stretch twill with detachable, adjustable braces, concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, fly with a press-stud and flap patch pockets.
Long, sleeveless dress in viscose jersey with frilled, elasticated shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and an elasticated seam under the bust.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap, flap with a zip, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 8x18x23 cm.
Double-layered jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Waistcoat in twill with buttons down the front and welt front pockets. Lined.
Top in thin sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy crinkled weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, buttons down the front and rounded hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Padded jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastener down the front. Zipped chest pocket, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Wide top in linen jersey with a turtle neck and short cap sleeves.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems. Soft brushed inside to help retain warmth.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Tier on the skirt for added width.
Loose-fit, cotton poplin shirt with a collar, dropped shoulders, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a fake fly and regular waist with a decorative drawstring and elastication at the back. Side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Lined triangle bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back, a wide elastic trim and two frills at the hem, and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sandals in imitation leather with decorative appliqués at the front and an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Trousers in woven fabric with pin stripes, elasticated waist with ties, side pockets, jetted fake pockets at the back and straight legs with short slits at the hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waste for optimum fit.
Satin top with a gently draped neckline and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Slides with thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Mesh trainers with rubber details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Joggers in a soft cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Fake fly, side pockets, back pockets and tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with ribbing at the cuffs. The tops of the thumb, index and middle finger are made from touchscreen-compatible fabric.

Short dress in airy chiffon with flounces down the front and back, a V-neck and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined. The polyester content of the chiffon is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Gently tailored, double-breasted jacket in a textured weave containing some wool with notch lapels, welt front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. Two-piece set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with soft elastication at the waist, and overlocked edges at the hems.
